ygData.subject: RE: Bardic Hot Buttons
ygData.msgSnippet: the songs that do not exist are levels 39, 45, 47, 49.  the level 22 song exists but has no effects.  i think its a great list, and even though a letter was
ygData.messageBody:
the songs that do not exist are levels 39, 45, 47, 49. the level 22 song
exists but has no effects. i think its a great list, and even though a
letter was just sent to GZ, it can't hurt. hopefully the more they hear
from bards the more they will look at us.

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: Mike.Langlois@...
>
>
>
> * SNIP *
>
> This is a pretty good list, however, we *just* sent a message
> to GZ with
> much of this on it. Let's wait a bit for some sort of a
> response before
> squeaking again ;)
>
> Talies the Wanderer
>
> * SNIP *
>
> I agree, this is to include in a letter which contains some
> other constructive (
> I hope ) things, and will be to Brad. I think GZ needs more
> specifics than this
> letter will include. The goal is to raise the general level
> of awareness of our
> class to the team in general. We've all noticed that
> warriors, rogues, and
> rangers get alot of tinkering. My guess...large player base,
> large amount of
> feedback (or in the rogue's case, very broken and
> embarrassing). So, since
> we're such a small group I'm hoping to do a little PR with
> the big guy and have
> him and his team think on us a bit.
>
> Anyone out there have a list of the songs that still aren't
> implemented? Are
> there any?
>
> Golias, Solusek Ro
